name: Zombie Apocalypse Survivor
description:
This is a survivor zombie game, you encounter a lot of zombies in an abandoned village, they are very dangerous, you must survive here. So you must strengthen yourself, upgrade your weapons, enhance your various attributes, and fight the zombies face to face!

Game play:
♦ WSAD control movement, space bar jump.
♦ Mouse control Angle, right mouse button switch Angle.
♦ Skills are automatically released, zombies are automatically generated.

Game Features:
A lot of zombies chasing you, you need to constantly run and fight back.
♦ Lots of skills and buffs to stop zombie attacks.
♦ Store props to help you deal with a variety of adverse situations.
